page.title: 15INFORMATION SYSTEMS.
page.content: Postal services are provided at the Post Office.These include the Giro Bank,payment of pensions and allowances,dog and T.V.licences and stamps.The post lady begins work at 7am.sorting the post at Burton Pidsea and finishes about 11.30am.She delivers to 325 houses in Roos. Dr.Isherwood's surgery,Rectory Rd. has a dispensary too.A baby clinic takes place there monthly. Mr.Burn,the village blacksmith does welding,but nolonger provides the service of a farrier. At the abbatoir local farmars take their animals:pigs,sheep and cattle, for slaughter. At Northend there is a garage doing car repairs and selling petrol. The village is served by a mobile library,greengrocer,fishmonger,butcher baker,and Withernsea/Hull bus service.
